    Let's Talk

Ruben Gutierrez: Professional Website Designer

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a freelance website designer in La Habra, California. I've been working on computers since I was 10 and website for the past few years.

My interest in technology started when I received my first computer for Christmas. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back together I was researching new ways to try and make it work faster. Fast forward a couple years and I began to help my friends and family fix their computers.

Blog

Here I post about what I'm currently working on.

Moving Over to 11ty from Jekyll

Part of the reason I moved over from Jekyll to 11ty was the Build time. While Jekyll is really good for smaller websites it starts falling on it's face as the website gets bigger

Adding A Side Menu To My Website & Building A Pricing Tool

Spent yesterday adding a side menu to my website and currently building out a pricing tool that can help you estimate how much a website is going to cost based on relative information.

Reading Can Help Improve Your Life & Your Mental Health

Reading has helped me learn so many skills I would have not otherwise had. It's helped me gain new perspectives and allowed me to empathies with people who'm I might have just walked by.

Your Fear of Failing Is Keeping You From Making Money

The fear of failing and messing things ups can keep you from doing what you want to do. Even worse if you let those thoughts linger for too long you'll become paralyzed and you can suddenly feel like your in the passenger seat of your own life.
